fullText:
Adding a nice way to visualize the PPO objective to the rlhf book. Core for policy-gradient is L~ R*A (R=policy ratio, A = advantage).

Make good actions more likely up to a point.
Make bad actions less likely up to a point.
The min(...), & sign of adv determine which line. https://t.co/93Az1PZP3U
